sen.j: 大江高校前駅（おおえこうこうまええき）は、京都府福知山市大江町 (京都府)金屋にある、北近畿タンゴ鉄道(KTR)北近畿タンゴ鉄道宮福線の鉄道駅。
sen.e: Oe Koko-mae Station is a railroad station on the Kitakinki Tango Railway (KTR) Miyafuku Line located at Kanaya, Oe-cho, Fukuchiyama City, Kyoto Prefecture.
Oe Koko-mae Station is a railroad facility on the Kitakinki Tango Railway (KTR) Miyafuku Line located at Kanaya, Oe-cho, Fukuchiyama City, Kyoto Prefecture.
Oe Kokomae Station, located at Kanaya, Oe-cho (Kyoto Prefecture), Fukuchiyama City, Kyoto Prefecture, is a railroad facility on the Miyafuku Line which is operated by Kitakinki Tango Railway (KTR).

sen.j: 駅構造
sen.e: Structure of the station
The station's structure
Station layout
sen.cmt: 他の記事と統一しました。

sen.j: 西側に片面1面1線のプラットホームを持つ無人駅である。
sen.e: Oe Koko-mae Station is an unmanned station that has a platform with a single railroad track on its west side.
Oe Koko-mae Station is an unmanned facility having a platform with a single railroad track on its west side.
Oe Kokomae Station is an unmanned facility having a platform with a single railroad track on its west side.

sen.j: 宮福線は駅北方でトンネルに入る。
sen.e: The Miyafuku Line enters a tunnel on the north of the station.
The Miyafuku Line enters a tunnel north of the station.
The Miyafuku Line enters a tunnel north of the station.

sen.j: 駅舎は無く、階段で高架上のホームへ上る。
sen.e: There is no station office and passengers climb the stairs to the platform built on the elevated railroad.
There is no station office, and passengers climb the stairs to the platform built along the elevated railroad.
There is no station building, and the elevated platform is reached by means of a stairway.
sen.cmt: 他の記事と統一しました。

sen.j: ホームに待合室がある。
sen.e: There is a waiting room on the platform.
There is a waiting room on the platform.
There is a waiting room on the platform.

sen.j: 快速は特急の回送を兼ねた183系のため、ホームからはみ出して停車する。
sen.e: Special express trains, which use the 183-series model cars, stop at the platform with some of their length sticking out of the platform.
Special express trains, which use the 183 Series cars, stop here, but due to their length they extend beyond the platform.
Rapid trains, which use the Series 183 cars, stop here, but due to their length they extend beyond the platform.
sen.cmt: 快速→rapid trains としました。

sen.j: 客扱いは2号車のみのため、乗降には問題ない。
sen.e: But this causes no problem, since passengers get on and off special express trains using only the second car.
This causes no problem, because passengers get on and off special express trains using only the second car.
This causes no problem, because passengers get on and off rapid trains using only the second car.
sen.cmt: 快速→rapid trains としました。

sen.j: 駅周辺
sen.e: Areas around the station
The station's surroundings
Station surroundings
sen.cmt: 他の記事と統一しました。

sen.j: 国道175号から北へ少し入った所に位置する。
sen.e: The station is located a little north of Route 175.
The station is located slightly north of Route 175.
The station is located slightly north of National Route 175.
sen.cmt: 国道→national route としました。

sen.j: 京都府立大江高等学校は東600m先。
sen.e: Kyoto Prefectural Oe Senior High School is located 600 meters east of the station.
Kyoto Prefectural Oe Senior High School is located 600 meters east of the station.
Kyoto Prefectural Oe Senior High School is located 600 meters east of the station.

sen.j: 大江高校を駅から直接見ることはできない。
sen.e: Oe Senior High School is not directly visible from the station.
Oe Senior High School isn't directly visible from the station.
Oe Senior High School isn't directly visible from the station.

sen.j: 利用状況
sen.e: Utilization by passengers
Passenger usage statistics
Passenger use
sen.cmt: 他の記事と統一しました。

sen.j: 2006年度の1日あたりの乗車人員は約236人である。
sen.e: The number of daily passengers using the station was 236 in 2006.
The average daily number passengers using the station was 236 in 2006.
The average daily number of passengers using the station was 236 in fiscal year 2006.
sen.cmt: fiscal year を追加しました。

sen.j: （京都府統計書より）
sen.e: (Kyoto Prefecture Statistics Report)
(Kyoto Prefecture Statistical Report)
(According to the Kyoto Prefecture Statistics Report)
sen.cmt: 他の記事と統一しました。

sen.j: 大江高校への通学の利用者がいる。
sen.e: Passengers include students who commute to Oe Senior High School.
Passengers include students who commute to Oe Senior High School.
Passengers include students who commute to Oe Senior High School.

sen.j: 宮福線では3番目に利用者が多く、中間駅では一番多い。
sen.e: Oe Koko-mae Station has the third largest number of passengers on the Miyafuku Line and the largest number of passengers of all the intermediate stations on the line.
Oe Koko-mae Station has the third-largest number of passengers on the Miyafuku Line and the largest number of passengers of all the intermediate stations on the line.
Oe Kokomae Station has the third-largest number of passengers on the Miyafuku Line and the largest number of passengers of all the intermediate stations on the line.

sen.j: そのためか、2007年3月改正より、朝通学時間帯の天橋立行きの快速が停車するようになった。
sen.e: Partly for this reason, special express trains bound for Ama no Hashidate have come to make a stop at this station during morning commuting hours since the train schedule revision in March 2007.
Partly for this reason, special express trains bound for Ama no Hashidate have come to make stops at the station during the morning commuting hours since the timetable revision of March 2007.
Partly for this reason, rapid trains bound for Amanohashidate have come to make stops at the station during the morning commuting hours since the timetable revision of March 2007.

sen.j: 歴史
sen.e: History
History
History

sen.j: 1988年（昭和63年）7月16日：宮福鉄道（現・北近畿タンゴ鉄道）宮福線の駅として開業。
sen.e: Oe Koko-mae Station opened as part of the Miyafuku Railway (currently, the Kita-kinki Tango Railway) Miyafuku Line on July 16, 1988.
Oe Koko-mae Station opened as part of the Miyafuku Railway (currently the Kita-kinki Tango Railway) Miyafuku Line on July 16, 1988.
July 16, 1988: Oe Kokomae Station opened as part of the Miyafuku Railway (currently the Kitakinki Tango Railway) Miyafuku Line.
sen.cmt: Kokomae としました。日付、コロン の表現に統一しました。
